thread.title: John Stamos speaks on relationship with `cute` ex Paula Abdul
thread.title_full: John Stamos speaks on relationship with `cute` ex Paula Abdul - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: John Stamos speaks on relationship with `cute` ex Paula Abdul
text:
*Melbourne, Oct. 3(ANI): John Stamos has recently opened up on his former relationship with then superstar Paula Abdul.*
Melbourne, Oct. 3(ANI): John Stamos has recently opened up on his former relationship with then superstar Paula Abdul. Talking about his romance that ended in 1991 with the 53-year-old songstress, the 'Full House' star cleared the speculations that her song 'Cold Hearted' was not about him, as it came out before the duo started dating, reports News.com.au. Claiming that Abdul is cute, the 52-year-old actor said that they had a great relationship and are still friends. Stamos further said that when they started dating Abdul was America's sweetheart, but he just had one show in his hand and people were ready to knock him out to get to the singer. (ANI) Â»
